txt.en: You hit something solid and unearth it!
An unnatural chill sets in...
The shade fades into nothingness
Trying to open the treasure chest caused an angry shade to attack you.\n\nNow that you've vanquished it, you should try to open the chest again.
The contents of the treasure were more troubling than valuable: an intact skull, and a metallic tooth like Kotheret's.\n\nYou should return to her in Mâr Naphra and seek answers.
Kotheret Glint-grin seems to have vanished from Mâr Naphra.
Open the treasure chest
Search for the rumoured treasure in Bax Garâkh

The amount of coins in the chest barely comes close to what you were expecting -- or rather, hoping for.

What truly catches your attention, however, is the preserved skull that sits among the coins. It greets you with an eternal, lipless smile.

Hidden among the shining coins is a metallic tooth, one that looks eerily similar to Kotheret Glint-grin's...
Find Kotheret Glint-grin in Mâr Naphra
TBD
Completed
Try to open the treasure chest
Dig into the sand mound
TBD
TBD
You have discovered the possible location of the treasure cache.\n\nYou should dig into the sand mound.
Kotheret Glint-grin seems to have vanished from Mâr Naphra. You may have your suspicions about what you discovered, but it seems your questions will never be put to rest.
Rumours of a treasure cache that once belonged to a Corsair captain have reached your ears.
The Fabled Fortune
The ground here bears signs of past treasure-seekers
Try as you might, you cannot find Kotheret anywhere
You've discovered what appears to be the treasure Kotheret told you about.\n\nYou should try to open it.
TBD
Kotheret Glint-grin told you about the rumoured treasure. Whether the treasure is real, she cannot say.\n\nIt may have been buried somewhere in Bax Garâkh, east of Mâr Naphra.

'A [placeholder], are you?' The woman grins widely, revealing a metallic tooth. 'The sort who seeks out grave danger in the spirit of adventure? I'd wager you'll want to hear what I have to say, then.

'When you've stuck around Mâr Naphra for as long as I have, you pick up all sorts of... interesting stories. One story has fragmented into naught but rumours: a bloodthirsty Corsair captain, a cache of buried treasure...

'Many an ambitious soul has ventured east to Bax Garâkh in search of this treasure. Whether they've been successful, I cannot say I know. Perhaps the treasure does not exist after all.

'Ah, I've taken up enough of your time. Watch yourself, traveller. Not everyone here is as friendly as I.'
TBD
